animations.name: Breathing Idle
animations.description: Character stands naturally with subtle chest breathing movements.

animations.name: Hands Forward Gesture
animations.description: Character casually extends both arms forward with relaxed hand gesture.

animations.name: Head Nod Yes
animations.description: Character nods head up and down in agreement.

animations.name: Sarcastic Head Nod
animations.description: Character performs a slow, exaggerated head nod with sarcastic attitude.

animations.name: Standing Arguing
animations.description: Character displays argumentative body language with emphatic hand gestures.

animations.name: Talking
animations.description: Character talks in standing straight position with one hand in idle position, using the other hand for gestures.

animations.name: Talking (1)
animations.description: Character talks with one hand on hip, using the other hand for gestures.

animations.name: Talking (2)
animations.description: Character talks in disagreement or anger with both hands gesturing.

animations.name: Waving (1)
animations.description: Character raises hand and waves side to side in greeting.

animations.name: Yelling
animations.description: Character yells with wide-open mouth and emphatic body gestures.
